Name: zho-anonymousgroupo-la
Author: Anonymous Group Of Translators
Source: Goodword Books , http://www.goodwordbooks.com/ , Center for Peace and Spirituality , https://www.cpsglobal.org/

Translations.Text: Ni shuo:“Bu xindao de renmen a
Wo bu chongbai nimen suo chongbai de
nimen ye bu chongbai wo suo chongbai de
wo bu hui chongbai nimen suo chongbai de
nimen ye bu hui chongbai wo suo chongbai de
nimen you nimen de bao ying, wo yeyou wo de baoying.”
Dangzhenzhu de yuanzhu he shengli jianglin
er ni kanjian zhongren cheng qun jie dui de chongfeng zhenzhu de zongjiao shi
ni yingdang zansong ni de zhu chaojue wanwu, bingqie xiang ta qiurao, ta que shi zhi you de
Yuan yan fu liangshou shoushang! Ta biding shoushang
ta de caichan he tasuo huode de, jiang wu bi yu ta
ta jiang ru you yan de liehuo
ta de dan chai de qizi, ye jiang ru liehuo
ta de jing shang xizhe yitiao jianshi de shengzi
